ModMetaData.name: Higher Psylink
ModMetaData.author: Seti
ModMetaData.description: adds psylinks up to lvl 10. Also has in-built support for blindsight - truesight, have fun! !!!!!!This mod also adds 4 Abilities!!!! Thanks to Marek15 they now work! I chose to make higher lvl psylinks enhance consciousness, I had to make them still be well... worth it.
